title: 求助，这个怎么回事
author: ghost_SL
txt_content:
不会发图片打字吧，新人第一次发帖froge mod loader found a problem with your minecraft installation the mods and versions listed below could not be found
froge:minimum version required is 10.13.2
the file 'FrogeModLoader-client-0.log contains more information
打字辛苦，求解答吧，谢谢了

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content:
ghost_SL 发表于 2015-3-29 13:33
这个是外网啊，我这里卡的要死，请问您能弄一个网盘地址给我吗？感激不尽 ...
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1bnzwmLL

replies.txt_content:
